definition: front/forward/ahead/first/top (followed by a number)/future/ago/before/BC (e.g. 前293年)/former/formerly
enemy/to be a match for/to rival/to resist/to withstand
commander-in-chief/top military commander for a country or theater of operations
Military Commission of the Communist Party Central Committee/same as 軍委|军委
provincial military governor during the early Republic of China era (1911-1949 AD)
to send armed forces to suppress
north China army, a modernizing Western-style army set up during late Qing, and a breeding ground for the Northern Warlords after the Qinghai revolution
National Protection Army of 1915 (in rebellion against Yuan Shikai 袁世凱|袁世凯[Yuan2 Shi4 kai3])
the Northern Expedition, the Nationalists' campaign of 1926-1928 under Chiang Kai-shek, against the rule of local warlords
Fu Zuoyi (1895-1974), Guomindang general, subsequently PRC top general and politician
